name: Alice
title: alice.tech
shortDescription: Alice is an AI-powered study tool designed to help students optimize their learning process. By transforming uploaded materials into tailored notes and exercises, Alice identifies study gaps and enhances exam preparation. Ideal for students who need efficient, personalized study aids, Alice acts like a smart, supportive friend who prepares you for academic success.
cons: Dependent on quality of uploaded content

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Quizlet
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers study sets and interactive tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Coursera
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Wide range of courses and professional certificates
